legend_0015_cassiopeia_02:
I hacked your smartphone so I could talk to you.
Hope you don’t mind.[VAR 0114(002C)]
legend_0015_cassiopeia_03:
Well, as far as you’re concerned, it means I’m
basically in control of your phone right now.[VAR 0114(002C)]
legend_0015_cassiopeia_05:
But never mind that—it’s you I want to talk about.
I hear you’re a Trainer with serious potential.[VAR 0114(0009)]
legend_0015_cassiopeia_06:
If that description is accurate, there’s something
I’d like to ask of you.[VAR 0114(0009)]
legend_0015_cassiopeia_07:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Tell me, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]... You
know\r
about\r
Team\r
Star, right?[VAR 0114(0009)]
legend_0015_cassiopeia_14:
Nice try, but I know for a fact you’ve already
crossed paths with them.[VAR 0114(0009)]
legend_0015_cassiopeia_15: Great. I appreciate you being up-front here.[VAR 0114(0009)]
legend_0015_cassiopeia_08:
Team Star is a group of troublemakers formed by
some academy students a while back...[VAR 0114(0009)]
legend_0015_cassiopeia_09:
They cause headaches for the school and try to
bring other students down to their level.[VAR 0114(0009)]
legend_0015_cassiopeia_10:
And I refuse to sit idly by and let them get away
with it![VAR 0114(0009)]
legend_0015_cassiopeia_11:
So I’ve come up with a plan to bring down Team
Star and force them to disband for good.\c
I call it...Operation Starfall![VAR 0114(0009)]
legend_0015_cassiopeia_12:
But I’ll need allies to carry out this operation...
and I’d like you to be one of them.[VAR 0114(0009)]
legend_0015_cassiopeia_13:
No need to reply right this second. We can
discuss the details some other time.\c
Till then, I’ll leave you to it. Bye.[VAR 0114(0009)]
